contents.words: Oh, great landing Co-ords. You'd think Smith could have given us a bit of cover...but no...It's the middle of a bloody dust bowl. This is not a good place Commander!
We're going to need a full set of actuator dampener replacments with all these Pod-Drops.
It's either that or put the Leopard at greater risk. Commander, expect enemy reinforcements - a crap ton of them!

They are really chucking everything at us. It's going to be like 'Metal rain' down there. We have high orbit DropPods from the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreProtectorate],Protectorate]] and... one unknown.
We're here for the long haul people and when all Proctorate 'Mechs are disabled or destroyed then Sumire will coordinate the extraction procedures.
I have diverted what forces I can from my stores complex seeing as it is secure... for now. I would appreciate it if you could make sure some of them survive.
zzzzzt.. 'frail' meatbags ar$% not wor##hy of the #$%ter's attenti*&%. sszzzhhhhhttt...

What...? How...? Boss, it nealy made it through that time - the polymophic encryption algorithim is at it's limit. Let's wrap this up ASAP as I can't guarantee I can keep them out for too much longer.
zzzzzt.. #@is is wher$ $%you expire meatba$%zzzz ^&$$^%#not wor##hy of the #$%ter's attenti*&%. I wil$ bury&^%^%nder a wav^& o$ meta%&^ /// COMMUNICATION TERMINATED ///
Crapshoots Commander. Someone's coming through on the Dediacated Command Channel. That's our reserved Command channel and noboby outside our command crew knows that exists except...
By the authority of the High Lady of the Aurigan Coalition there are 'misappropriated' BattleMechs being used in this conflict. CEASE and DESIST and power down your 'Mechs.
Yeah - I was wondering when they would get round to attempting their 'Collection activities' regarding this DropShip and it's contents. Seems we're not quite done with the Arano Restoration just yet.
